title: For the past week, my connection to LoL has been bad.
body:
This is severely halting my climb to Diamond, Riot.

However, when in-game, my ping sits at 40 then just jumps to 400 and slowly goes back down, then repeats. I suspect this is a packet loss issue and I am dropping mad packets. Oddly, though, my ping is only bad to LoL. Speedtest, downloading, other games, etc. are all perfectly fine.

This is upsetting me.

Also, Super Galaxy Annie is 5/7.

replies.body: Are you still having issues with your connection? If so, give the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article a shot. If that doesn't fix it, we can try to diagnose the issue further here.
